    • Constructor Detail

      • Wizard

        public Wizard(double x,
      double y,
      double radius,
      int health,
      Spell[] spells,
      int mana,
      double manaRegen)
        Creates a new Wizard
        Parameters:
        x - The initial x-position of the Wizard.
        y - The initial y-position of the Wizard.
        radius - The radius of the Wizards' circular shape.
        health - The initial amount of health.
        spells - The initial spellbook of the Wizard.
        mana - The initial and maximum mana of the Wizard.
        manaRegen - The mana regeneration of the Wizard.

    • Method Detail

      • attemptToCastSpell

        public boolean attemptToCastSpell(Spell spell,
                         double x,
                         double y)
        Attempts to cast the given spell and if the Wizard succeeds he will lose mana accordingly to the mana cost of the spell. In order to cast the spell the Wizard needs to have it in his spellbook and spells from getSpellbook() is therefore only accepted. Secondly the Wizard needs to have enough mana to cast the spell.
        Parameters:
        spell - The spell to be casted (from his spellbook, getSpellbook())
        x - The x-position the spell was called upon.
        y - The y-position the spell was called upon.
        Returns:
        True if the spell fulfilled the criteria to be casted, false otherwise.

      • onTick

        public void onTick()
        Description copied from class: WorldObject
        Defines the change of state of the object every game tick. This generally includes movement. Collision detection should not be done here.
        Specified by:
        onTick in class WorldObject

      • addSpell

        public void addSpell(Spell spell)
        Add the given Spell to the Wizards spellbook.
        Parameters:
        spell - The Spell to be learned.

      • getSpellbook

        public Spell[] getSpellbook()
        The Spellbook of the Wizard. These are the only spells that are accepted to be used in attemptToCastSpell.
        Returns:
        The Spells the Wizard may use.

      • getMana

        public int getMana()
        The amount of available mana.
        Returns:
        the available mana.
